video_prompt: The video features an old man walking down a street, reflecting on the passage of time and discussing customer expectations. The camera follows him closely, capturing his expressions and movements against an urban backdrop with trees and buildings.

speech_prompt.speaker: the old man.
speech_prompt.text: It has been a long time since I left here. I didn't remember how many years. Ten or twelve maybe. What customers want is not cheap. What they want is to feel that they have taken advantage of it
